mapper.insert: INSERT INTO joinclass SET class_id = #{classId}, user_id = #{userId}, discount = #{discount}, certification = #{certification}
mapper.select: SELECT C.aca_pic, C.aca_name, B.class_name FROM joinclass A INNER JOIN class B ON A.class_id = B.class_id INNER JOIN academy C ON B.aca_id = C.aca_id WHERE A.user_id = #{userId} LIMIT #{startIdx}, #{size}

SELECT E.user_pic, E.name, D.exam_date, CASE WHEN F.SCORE_TYPE = 0 THEN D.score ELSE NULL END AS result_score, CASE WHEN F.SCORE_TYPE != 0 THEN CASE WHEN COALESCE(D.PASS, 0) = 0 THEN '불합격' ELSE '합격' END ELSE NULL END AS result_pass FROM academy A INNER JOIN class B ON A.aca_id = B.aca_id INNER JOIN joinclass C ON B.class_id = C.class_id INNER JOIN grade D ON C.join_class_id = D.join_class_id INNER JOIN `user` E ON E.user_id = C.user_id INNER JOIN `subject` F ON F.subject_id = D.subject_id WHERE A.aca_id = #{acaId} ORDER BY D.exam_date DESC LIMIT #{startIdx}, #{size}
